sect3.title: Keyboard Layouts
sect3.para: Selecting a keyboard layout is now simpler with the Keyboard control panel. Just click Add to choose from a list of international keyboard layouts. Before making your choice you can see the effect of key presses in the layout preview. The Layout Options section has also been reorganized as a simpler list of choices.

textobject.phrase: The Layouts tab, in the Keyboard Preferences control panel, while adding a new layout.
